pages.text: Contracts are otherworldly pacts purchased from $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demons$().$(br2)They can be signed with a $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$(), after which using it will apply its conditions on whoever "signed" it.$(br2)While most Contracts are usually signed in self-interest, some, like $(l:bewitchment:contracts/death)Death$(), are best used on other people.

Always keep in mind that Contracts, as demonic things do, are usually two sided, and will affect whoever signed them or forced them.$(br2)Maybe attaining $(l:bewitchment:creatures/baphomet)someone's$() favor could negate that.$(br2)Contracts last seven days, and cannot be broken.
